channel.title: Micro Service on Learn with AI
channel.description: Recent content in Micro Service on Learn with AI

item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about RESTful API ChatGPT answer: What is RESTful API and how does it differ from other types of APIs? How does RESTful API facilitate communication between applications? What are the five main architectural constraints of RESTful API? Can you explain the difference between synchronous and asynchronous programming in the context of RESTful API? How do you ensure security and privacy when using RESTful API to exchange data between applications?
